name: Excelaball
description:
You know marble rolling games like Monkey Ball and Rolled Out?
Well, this game is like them, except FASTER!!!

This game is made with speedrunning in mind, you'll be able to roll like the excelaball you are! (Also the ball you're playing as is called the excelaball)

....Except not really,  i haven't finished the game yet.

There's no main menu, no level select menu, not even an options menu!

And i haven't made any actual levels yet, there's only one test stage!

...but still, i'll keep working on this game, so i need all the feedback i could get!

Made in Uchronia Project Blender Game Engine (UPBGE for short)
